Interface StudentHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StudentHandlerImpl

    public interface StudentHandler
    Author:
    Naman,Purnima,Radha,Ramit,Venisraj,Vignesh This Module will be responsible for the new user creation, Validate student, course registration, view grades, payment of course.
